More hats please!

Heh, the first time I'm mentioned in the SE blog, it's for... mod abuse ;)

Yakety Stacks is a flagging hat, and mods shouldn't really be flagging.

@Yannis: There are a few reasons for mods to flag a post, namely it's the only way to mark a post as spam. But anyways, it's not too bad.

As far as site specific hats, I think it would be great if you could pick a number of tags, and award special hats for the people who use those tags, in whatever way you see fit. Perhaps 5 tags would be right, or however many that you can make happen.

@Ben

Spam flags are the one exception and I almost always delete comments by flagging them, as it keeps a record of why I (at the time) thought the comment should be deleted (obsolete etc). I got Yakety Stacks for comment flags, it wasn't really mod abuse, my above comment wasn't exactly serious ;)
